p: Co-administration of PolyI:PolyC, lipoteichoic acid and CL097 (a TLR7/8 ligand , the imidazoquinoline compound with high antiviral activity) with an inactivated vaccine against the porcine reproductive and respiratory syndrome virus (PRRSV) conferred higher protection against infection [ 99]. An increased cellular immune response was found in guinea pigs immunized with VLP vaccine against the FMD virus in combination with PolyI:PolyC [ 100].
